DataElement.preferredName: Smokeless Tobacco Regular User Cessation Age Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the age of an individual who regularly used smokeless tobacco for at least six weeks stopped chewing tobacco or using snuff.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Smokeless Tobacco Greater Than or Equal To Six Week Regular Use Cessation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Tobacco that is not smoked but used in another form such as chewing tobacco or snuff._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one._Any period of seven consecutive days._Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something._Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense._A stopping._How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Tobacco that is not smoked but used in another form such as chewing tobacco or snuff.

Concepts.definition: Tobacco that is not smoked but used in another form such as chewing tobacco or snuff.

Property.preferredName: Greater Than or Equal To Six Week Regular Use Cessation Age
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.:Any period of seven consecutive days.:Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern.:A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.:A stopping.:How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.
A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
Customary, usual, or at fixed intervals; conforming to a standard or pattern.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.
How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated for TCGA and released per approval from T.Lichtenberg. mc 11/9/12

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured, assigned or computed to describe an individual's age.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/21/22 jk added "Qualified" RS as part of MCL quarterly content review.  3/3/10 add "year" UOM

AlternateNames.name: Smokeless Tobacco Use Age At Quit

ReferenceDocuments.name: If the patient used smokeless
ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient used smokeless tobacco (including chewing tobacco and snuff) regularly for at least six weeks, how old were they when they quit using?

ReferenceDocuments.description: If the patient used smokeless tobacco (including chewing tobacco and snuff) regularly for at least six weeks, how old were they when they quit using?
